name: Scrabble Interactive 2009 Edition
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

CLASSIC WORD GAME NOW ON THE GO

improve your Scrabble skills against a variety of opponents with Scrabble 2009 edition. Play classic Scrabble or brain teasing mini-games wherever you are and whenever you like.

With the updated official Scrabble Collins Dictionary
  • Progress from a Scrabble novice to world champion in single player story mode
  • Play with friends wherever you are using the Nintendo DS Wireless Communications
  • Check your words with the latest Collins Official Scrabble Dictionary
  • Play Hold Em and Tempest - two fun mini-games that add a new twist to the classic game
